
# Using RStudio with Git
 
```{r}
install.packages("usethis")
library(usethis)
```
## Configure your Git
```{r}
# in the console
## edit_git_config()
```
## Git commands
```{r}
# git add .         to stage all files
# git commit -m    "commit comment" to commit all the staged files
# git push         to push the commited files to the remote
```
